00021 #include "cimunit_thread.h"

00028 static int vxworks_task_handoff(int function, int arg1) {
00029   cimunit_task_entry_t func = (cimunit_task_entry_t)function;
00030   (func)((void *)arg1);
00031   return 0;
00032 }
00033 
00034 
00035 int cimunit_thread_create(
00036   cimunit_thread_t * RESTRICT thread, 
00037   cimunit_task_entry_t function,
00038   void *RESTRICT arg)
00039 {
00040   *thread = taskSpawn(NULL, 100, 0, 16332, vxworks_task_handoff,
00041                       (int)function, (int)arg,
00042                       0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00043   return 0;
00044 }
00045 
00046 int cimunit_thread_join(cimunit_thread_t thread, void **value_ptr){
00047   TASK_DESC taskInfo;
00048   while(OK == taskInfoGet(thread, &taskInfo)) {
00049     if (WIND_DEAD == taskInfo.td_status) {
00050       break;
00051     }
00052     taskDelay(1);
00053   }
00054   return 0;
00055 }
00056 
00057 cimunit_thread_t cimunit_thread_self(){
00058   return taskIdSelf();
00059 }
00060 
00061 void cimunit_thread_sleep(int time) {
00062   int clkRate = sysClkRateGet();
00063 
00064   taskDelay(((time * sysClkRateGet()) / 1000) + 1);
00065 }
